description:
Mac is 19 and has never been away from home.
"This was my first flight on an airplane," he told us. "I met a flight attendant — she's pretty sweet — she says she's going to hook me up with her daughter!"
"Did she show you a picture of the daughter?" we asked.
"Yeah, she actually did. She [the daughter] was quite beautiful," he replied. "She showed me a picture of her two daughters."
"Did she ask you which one you wanted?"
"Actually, she did," Mac said.
"So by that I'm guessing you're straight."
"Yes I am straight," he said matter-of-factly.
"Ever slept with a guy?"
"I have never slept with a guy," he said, this time emphatically.
"Ever fool around with a guy?"
"I have
fooled around with a guy," he said.
Then he added: "Except for when I was young. That doesn't count."
He didn't want to talk about it on camera, but apparently there was some sucky-sucky with a high school bud.
Before we starting shooting, he wanted to tell us something about himself.
"I can cum 10 or 12 times a day," he said.
The way he likes to masturbate is to ejaculate, then take a 15-20 minute break, then pop out another one, and repeat.
He was able to dump multiple loads all in a single day!
title: Mac
